game.name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Definitive Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - 완전판 에디션에는 오리지널 Dawn of War와 모든 확장팩이 포함되어 있으며, 개선된 그래픽, 향상된 카메라, 64비트 플랫폼 지원과 함께 궁극의 Dawn of War를 경험할 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Definitive Edition is the ultimate Dawn of War experience, featuring the original Dawn of War and all its expansions, along with enhanced visuals, an improved camera, and 64-bit platform support.

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]That's it? This is all the so-called 'definitive' edition can give us?[/h1] There's a visual upgrade, and while it's not much, overall I'd conside...
They fucked with the pathfinding and now my units refuse to go explicitly where I've told them to, it's a big enough issue that it warrents a neggativ...
